snippet: A class action lawsuit against employers in Silicon Valley, including Apple and Google, has lifted the curtain on secret, anti-competitive deals.
abstract: Editorial cites class action lawsuit brought on behalf of software programmers and other technical professionals against seven large employers in Silicon Valley, including Apple and Google; observes suit has lifted curtain on secret, anti-competitive deals; says case undermines egalitarian and competitive image of technology industry.
lead_paragraph: A class action lawsuit against employers in Silicon Valley, including Apple and Google, has lifted the curtain on secret, anti-competitive deals.
